# Safety

### `r emo::ji("rotating_light")` If you are experiencing an emergency, please dial 911 immediately! `r emo::ji("rotating_light")` {-}

## SafeCampus

If you feel unsafe or at-risk in any way while on campus, contact [SafeCampus](https://www.washington.edu/safecampus/) (206-685-7233) anytime&ndash;&ndash;no matter where you work or study&ndash;&ndash;to anonymously discuss safety and well-being concerns for yourself or others. SafeCampus can provide individualized support, discuss short- and long-term solutions, and connect you with additional resources when requested. 

## Emergency contacts

Our lab keeps a confidential list of emergency contacts for every member of the lab. If you have not yet done so, please fill out [this form](https://forms.gle/i3Qpvajjh7aK4Gp98) with the name and contact information of at least one person you would to be contacted in the event of an emergency.
